items.sentence: Do you know anyone who hums while they work?

You\'re the best brother in the whole world.
You\'re welcome to stay as long as you want.
You\'ve been doing a pretty good job so far.
I can\'t talk right now. I\'m eating dinner.
You were the one who told me not to do that.
Tom knew that something was about to happen.

I know my daughter better than anybody else.
I had a little difficulty in getting a taxi.

I have a boiled egg for breakfast every day.
I have a friend who speaks French very well.
You should know that I\'m in love with Mary.
Tom falls in love with every woman he meets.
Tom is the only person who knows about this.
